Pre-Game Insights: Croatia is under pressure to perform well after a recent 2-1 defeat to Portugal.
Poland has a new lineup with goalkeeper Marcin Bulka and striker Krzysztof Piatek due to injuries to Szczesny and Milik.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is at The Opus Arena in Osijek, Croatia.
Croatia and Poland have a limited head-to-head history, with Croatia winning once in an official match.
